title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When trying to view the type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. By the way, can you provide an explanation of what this error message means?
OB: When attempting to view the type hierarchy of a binary project, the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed.
EB: When attempting to view the type hierarchy of a binary project, I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars instead of the error message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is displayed.
